narration:
"Welcome to Careers and Employability at LIT. This is an essential part of your student experience here, and I'm excited to walk you through what we have to offer.

As a student at LIT, you'll have access to a wide range of resources and support to help you achieve your career goals. Our team is dedicated to helping you develop the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in the workplace.

One of the key areas we focus on is career guidance. We understand that choosing a career path can be daunting, so we offer one-to-one consultations with our experienced advisors. They'll work with you to explore your interests, strengths, and values, and help you identify potential career paths that align with them.

We also have a range of online resources available to you, including job boards, industry insights, and tips on how to prepare for the workforce. Our website is a great place to start, where you can find information on everything from resume building to interview techniques.

In addition to these resources, we host various events throughout the year, such as career fairs, workshops, and networking sessions. These are fantastic opportunities to meet employers, learn about different industries, and make valuable connections in your field.

Our goal is to support you every step of the way, from choosing a career path to securing employment after graduation. We're committed to helping you achieve your full potential and succeed in whatever field you choose."
